bug.author: todor-yalamov
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
The files SoundEffect.h and SoundEffect.cpp are missing from the repository. Seems that in the commit "[w2l-sfx] fixing sound effect lib" (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/facebookresearch/wav2letter/commit/244f629b52f5ba1962773e015691047e9684db78>244f629</denchmark-link> ) the files AudioAugmenter.h and AudioAugmenter.cpp are renamed to SoundEffect.h and SoundEffect.cpp, but the latter are not added to the reposiotry. <denchmark-h:h4>Reproduction Steps</denchmark-h>
Clone the noise4 branch. git clone <denchmark-link:https://github.com/facebookresearch/wav2letter.git>https://github.com/facebookresearch/wav2letter.git</denchmark-link>
cd wav2letter git checkout noise4 <denchmark-h:h3>Platform and Hardware</denchmark-h>
All platforms.

comments.comment: Hi, noise4 branch is in experimental stages. Only the master branch is supported.
